News.headline: Club Statement: 28th October
News.short_description: A club statement regarding the consortium.
News.description:
The Club is pleased to announce that in line with the commitment given by the consortium proposing to invest into Dagenham & Redbridge FC it can confirm that it has now received the sum of Â£122,500 (being 10% of the entire investment and (for each individual) 10% of their personal investment) to the Club.

This has been accepted as an advanced non-refundable payment made as part of each investor's proposed investment in D&R 2016 Ltd, to be paid to D&R FC Ltd but to be noted in the books of D&R 2016 Ltd.
